title: Granny Strikes Back
description: A hilarious cozy mystery series from 3x USA TODAY Bestselling Author Harper Lin!Retired CIA agent Barbara Gold is getting ready for her dinner date with new love Octavian when a stealthy intruder breaks into her home and tries to kill her with a serrated knife. Even at seventy years old, Barbara is able to fight him off and still have enough energy for a romantic evening. The expertly trained hitman will come back for her soon, and Barbara only has a few days before her family returns from vacation to find out who he is, how he knows her, and why he wants her killed.Read the action-packed 3rd book in the Secret Agent Granny mystery series.
author: Harper Lin
